trans-unit.source: Manages a related set of tab pages.
trans-unit.target: 탭 페이지의 관련된 집합을 관리합니다.

trans-unit.source: A TabControl contains tab pages, which are represented by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> objects that you add through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Tabcontro 포함으로 표시 되는 탭 페이지 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>를 통해 추가 하는 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: The order of tab pages in this collection reflects the order the tabs appear in the control.
trans-unit.target: 이 컬렉션의 탭 페이지의 순서는 탭 컨트롤에 나타나는 순서를 반영 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The user can change the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> by clicking one of the tabs in the control.
trans-unit.target: 현재 사용자를 변경할 수 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>컨트롤의 탭 중 하나를 클릭 하 여.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically change the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> by using one of the following TabControl properties: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedTab%2A> In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], you can also use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectTab%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DeselectTab%2A> In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], you can respond when the current tab changes by handling one of the following events: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected> The tabs in a TabControl are part of the TabControl, but not parts of the individual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls.
trans-unit.target: 현재 또한 프로그래밍 방식으로 변경할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>TabControl 속성 중 하나를 사용 하 여:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedTab%2A>에 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], 다음 방법 중 하나를 사용할 수도 수:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectTab%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DeselectTab%2A>에 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], 다음 이벤트 중 하나를 처리 하 여 현재 탭이 변경 될 때 응답할 수:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected>TabControl에서 탭은는 TabControl의 일부 이지만 개별의 일부가 아니라 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DeselectTab%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectTab%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedTab%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: Members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> class, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> property, affect only the client rectangle of the tab page, but not the tabs.
trans-unit.target: 멤버는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>클래스 같은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>속성 탭이 아니라 탭 페이지의 클라이언트 영역에만 영향을 줄.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> will not hide the tab.
trans-unit.target: 또한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>탭을 숨기지</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> 메서드</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>

trans-unit.source: To hide the tab, you must remove the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 제거 해야 탭을 숨기려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>에서 제어는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>컬렉션.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> occur.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], 탭에 시기 결정 하기 위한 탭 페이지의 일부로 간주 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>발생.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page.
trans-unit.target: 이전 버전의.NET Framework는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>포커스 모드로 들어가거나 나올 클라이언트 사각형 탭 페이지의 경우에 있지만 포커스 들어가거나 나올 때 탭 문자인을 발생 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: The following events are not raised for the TabControl class unless there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 하나 이상 있으면 TabControl 클래스에 대 한 다음 이벤트가 발생 하지 않습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>컬렉션: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: If there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> names appear), the TabControl raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: 둘 이상 있는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>컬렉션에서 및 탭 컨트롤의 헤더와 상호 작용할 (여기서는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>이름이 표시), TabControl 적절 한 이벤트를 발생 시킵니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: However, if the user interaction is within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientRectangle%2A> of the tab page, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 사용자 상호 작용 안에 있는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientRectangle%2A>탭 페이지의는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>적절 한 이벤트를 발생 시킵니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientRectangle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Controls contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> are not created until the tab page is shown, and any data bindings in these controls are not activated until the tab page is shown.
trans-unit.target: 에 포함 된 컨트롤을 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>탭 페이지가 표시 되 고 이러한 컨트롤의 데이터 바인딩은 탭 페이지가 표시 될 때까지 활성화 되지 않으면 될 때까지 생성 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: When visual styles are enabled, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>, the tab contents might not render correctly.
trans-unit.target: 비주얼 스타일을 사용 하는 경우 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>속성 이외의 값으로 설정 됩니다 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>, 탭 내용이 제대로 렌더링 되지 않을 수도 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: To work around this issue, you can paint the tab contents yourself using owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: 이 문제를 해결 하려면 그릴 수 탭 내용을 소유자 그리기를 사용 하 여 직접 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Display Side-Aligned Tabs with TabControl](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [하는 방법: TabControl 된 탭이 Display Side-Aligned](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, the tab page contents might not render correctly.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>속성 이외의 값으로 설정 됩니다 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>속성 이외의 값으로 설정 됩니다 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, 탭 페이지 내용이 올바르게 렌더링 되지 않을 수도 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the area of the control (for example, along the top) where the tabs are aligned.
trans-unit.target: 탭을 맞출 위치 (예: 위쪽) 컨트롤의 영역을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the Alignment property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Multiline%2A> property is automatically set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 맞춤 속성이로 설정 되 면 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Multiline%2A>자동으로 속성이 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Multiline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, it only appears as such when the Alignment property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>맞춤 속성을 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> 로 설정 하는 경우에 따라서만 표시</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> , 속성</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> 을 설정 하면

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property displays as if set to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> value.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않은 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>속성 표시 처럼로 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>값.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, you must also set the Alignment property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> so that the buttons display correctly.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>속성을 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, 맞춤 속성 설정 해야 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>단추가 제대로 표시 되도록 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property to `Buttons`, you must also set the Alignment property to `Top` so that the tab page contents display correctly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 설정 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>속성을 `Buttons`, 맞춤 속성 설정 해야 `Top` 탭 페이지 내용을 제대로 표시 되도록 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, when visual styles are enabled, and the Alignment property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>, the tab contents may not render correctly.
trans-unit.target: 또한 비주얼 스타일이 사용 되 고 맞춤 속성은 설정 된 경우 값으로 이외의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>, 탭 내용이 올바르게 렌더링 되지 않을 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Top" name="Top" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Top" name="Top" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The property value is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 속성 값이 유효한 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the visual appearance of the control's tabs.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 탭의 시각적 모양을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When you set the Appearance property to `FlatButtons`, it only appears as such when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> property is set to `Top`.
trans-unit.target: 모양 속성을 설정 하면 `FlatButtons`, 이러한 경우에만 표시는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>속성이 `Top`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the Appearance property appears as if set to the `Buttons` value.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않으면 표시 모양 속성 처럼로 설정 된 `Buttons` 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you set the Appearance property to `Buttons`, you must also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> property to `Top` so that the tab page contents display correctly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 모양 속성을 설정 하면 `Buttons`를 설정 해야는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>속성을 `Top` 탭 페이지 내용을 제대로 표시 되도록 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Normal" name="Normal" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Normal" name="Normal" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The property value is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 속성 값이 유효한 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는이 컨트롤에 의미가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The background color for the control.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤에 대 한 배경색입니다.

trans-unit.source: This event is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트는이 컨트롤에 의미가 없습니다.

trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는이 컨트롤에 의미가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The background image displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤에 표시할 배경 이미지입니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImage*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우의 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImage*>속성 변경.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImage*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImage%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the BackgroundImageChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImage%2A>BackgroundImageChanged 이벤트 변경을 감지 하 여를 처리 하 고 해당 값을 변경할 수는 있지만 속성은이 컨트롤에 의미가 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는이 컨트롤에 의미가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값 중 하나 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is Tile.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 타일입니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImageLayout*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우의 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImageLayout*>속성 변경.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImageLayout*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the BackgroundImageLayoutChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>BackgroundImageLayoutChanged 이벤트 변경을 감지 하 여를 처리 하 고 해당 값을 변경할 수는 있지만 속성은이 컨트롤에 의미가 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 키가 일반 입력된 키인지 또는 전처리가 필요한 특수 키인지 여부를 결정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Call this method during window-message preprocessing to determine whether the specified key is a regular input key that should be sent directly to the tab control or a special key (such as PAGE UP and PAGE DOWN) that should preprocessed.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 키 탭 컨트롤에 직접 보내야 하는 일반 입력된 키인지 또는 특수 키 (예: PAGE UP 및 PAGE DOWN) 해야 하는 전처리 되는지 확인 하려면 창 메시지를 전처리 하는 동안이 메서드를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: In the latter case, send the key to the control only if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase.
trans-unit.target: 후자의 경우 전처리 단계에서 사용 하지 않은 경우에 키를 컨트롤로 보냅니다.

trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], 탭에 시기 결정 하기 위한 탭 페이지의 일부로 간주 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>발생.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page.
trans-unit.target: 이전 버전의.NET Framework는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>포커스 모드로 들어가거나 나올 클라이언트 사각형 탭 페이지의 경우에 있지만 포커스 들어가거나 나올 때 탭 문자인을 발생 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> switches between the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls, depending on which keys are pressed.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 설명 방법을 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>선택한 사이 전환 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>제어 누른 키에 따라.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: |Key|Description| |---------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>|Selects the next <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>|Selects the previous <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>|Selects the next <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>|Selects the previous <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.|
trans-unit.target: | 키 | 설명 | |---------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>다음을 선택 합니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>| 이전 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>를 선택 합니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>다음을 선택 합니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>| Selects the previous <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.|</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 발생는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave"> </xref> 의 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], this method also raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> event of the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)],이 메서드 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>현재 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> 이벤트</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> 발생

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> occur.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], 탭에 시기 결정 하기 위한 탭 페이지의 일부로 간주 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>발생.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page.
trans-unit.target: 이전 버전의.NET Framework는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>포커스 모드로 들어가거나 나올 클라이언트 사각형 탭 페이지의 경우에 있지만 포커스 들어가거나 나올 때 탭 문자인을 발생 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 발생 시키는 대리자를 통해 이벤트 처리기를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트 처리 및 발생](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The OnLeave method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space around each item on the control's tab pages.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 탭 페이지에 각 항목 둘레의 공간 크기를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that specifies the amount of space around each item.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> 하는 각 항목 둘레의 공간 크기를 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is (6,3).
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 (6.3).

trans-unit.source: The width or height of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 너비 또는 높이 <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> 0 보다 작습니다.

trans-unit.source: This event is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트는이 컨트롤에 의미가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Previews a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: 키보드 메시지를 미리 봅니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, 처리할 창 메시지를 나타내는 참조로 전달 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>컨트롤이 메시지를 처리 하면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Removes all the tab pages and additional controls from this tab control.
trans-unit.target: 이 탭 컨트롤에서 모든 탭 페이지 및 추가 컨트롤을 제거합니다.

trans-unit.source: All controls are removed through the `Controls` property.
trans-unit.target: 모든 컨트롤을 통해 제거 되는 `Controls` 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether right-to-left mirror placement is turned on.
trans-unit.target: 오른쪽에서 왼쪽 방향의 미러 배치가 설정 되어 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The RightToLeftLayout property is primarily useful for developing forms for worldwide audiences.
trans-unit.target: RightToLeftLayout 속성은 전세계 사용자에 대 한 폼을 개발 하는 데 매우 유용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Many containers are designed so that controls are laid out in the container in a left-to-right fashion.
trans-unit.target: 많은 컨테이너 컨트롤이 왼쪽에서 오른쪽으로 컨테이너에 배치 되 되도록 설계 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: These containers are compatible with languages that follow this writing direction.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 컨테이너가 쓰기 방향 언어와 호환 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: However, when you display the same containers to users of right-to-left languages, it is often preferable to reverse the order of the controls on the form.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 오른쪽에서 왼쪽 방향 언어의 사용자에 게 동일한 컨테이너를 표시 하면 것이 좋습니다 폼에서 컨트롤의 순서를 반대로 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> properties are `true`, mirroring will be turned on for the container and control placement and text flow will be right-to-left.
trans-unit.target: 모두는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>속성은 `true`, 미러링 켜 집니다의 컨테이너 및 컨트롤 배치에 대 한 및 텍스트 방향에는 오른쪽에서 왼쪽 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.RightToLeftLayoutChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 값을 변경 발생는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.RightToLeftLayoutChanged>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.RightToLeftLayoutChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information about globalization issues, see [Best Practices for Developing World-Ready Applications](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 전역화 문제에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [지역화 대비 응용 프로그램 개발에 대 한 유용한](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if right-to-left mirror placement is turned on; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> for standard child control placement.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>오른쪽에서 왼쪽 방향의 미러 배치가 설정 되어 있으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 표준 자식 컨트롤 배치에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a tab is selected.
trans-unit.target: 탭을 선택 하는 경우 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the current tab changes in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, the following events occur in the following order.
trans-unit.target: 현재 탭에서 변경 되는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, 다음과 같은 이벤트가 다음 순서 대로 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting> - Selected These events let you perform tasks such as canceling a tab change if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> is in an invalid state or updating the state of a newly displayed <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting>선택한-이러한 이벤트를 사용 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>잘못 된 상태 이거나 새로 표시 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> 의 상태를 업데이트</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> 하는 경우 탭 변경을 취소 하는 등 작업을 수행할 수</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected> event and use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine the index of the selected tab page.
trans-unit.target: 처리할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected>이벤트 및 사용 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성을 선택된 된 탭 페이지의 인덱스를 확인 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected>
